original_title: 女弁護士 朝吹里矢子～小さな共犯者
overview: Attorney Asabuki Riyako goes to Ginza with her husband Kunio, where she almost has her handbag taken by a young boy. The youth had been involved in a murder case six years earlier. Yabuhara, the chief counsel at the firm Asabuki works at, was in charge of the case.
title: Asabuki Riyako, Female Attorney: The Little Accomplice
